thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: MARGARET
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by MARGARET

author: MARGARET
title: MARGARET
text:
I was met at Launceston airport by a friendly, helpful lady.
I explained that as my partner had passed away, I was travelling alone.
Later on in the conversation she used the word LONER. I was offended by that choice of word. I am an extravert and love company and am anything but a LONER.
